plugins.name: sigil
plugins.description: Risk-adaptive development pipeline with adversarial consensus code review. Four phases (scope, explore, design, build) that scale review rigor to match task complexity — from single reviewer for low-risk changes to blind parallel agents with Codex tiebreaker for high-risk work.

plugins.name: herald
plugins.description: Daily curated news digest for your domain. Fetches RSS feeds and Hacker News via public APIs, applies 3-layer deduplication and keyword filtering, scores and ranks the top 10 items as a grouped Markdown digest. Zero API keys, fully local.

plugins.name: arbiter
plugins.description: Multi-AI orchestrator — dispatch to Codex CLI and Gemini CLI for review, ask, implement, and panel modes. Compare answers from multiple providers in a single command.

plugins.name: teams-field-guide
plugins.description: Comprehensive field guide for Claude Code multi-agent systems. Covers Subagents and Agent Teams, custom agent configuration, 7 orchestration patterns, cost optimization with model distribution, known bugs with workarounds, and 26 ecosystem projects.

plugins.name: anvil
plugins.description: Plugin dev/test toolkit for heurema. Scaffold new plugins from templates, validate structure and conventions with 5 deterministic Python validators, test hooks with fixture-driven runner, and review quality with a 20-item checklist agent.

plugins.name: reporter
plugins.description: Report bugs, request features, and ask questions for any heurema product. Auto-detects repo from git remote, collects environment context (OS, shell, Claude Code version), previews the issue, and submits via gh CLI with clipboard fallback.

plugins.name: sentinel
plugins.description: Core sentiment stack for crypto trading — Fear & Greed Index, news scanning with sentiment scoring, social intelligence via LunarCrush, and prediction market odds from Polymarket. Unified SignalOutput v1 format. Three skills work free, one requires API key.
